name: Maria Lou Makeup
description: Maria is an up-and-coming entrepreneur who recently started her own cosmetics company. She devised a way to increase her sales and manpower without adding anyone to payroll: hiring Brand Ambassadors, who will receive a small percentage of each sale and a bonus for recruiting more Brand Ambassadors, to sell products for her. In this idle/clicker game, you expand her business from a small startup to a cosmetics empire.
